## canvasRenderer variable

Higher order function accepting an `HTMLCanvasElement` and returning a render function which accepts the following parameters:

- `fn` - shader function (compiled via `targetJS().compile(ast)`<!-- -->) - `x`<!-- -->, `y`<!-- -->, `w`<!-- -->, `h` - optional args to define a sub-region to be updated (default to full image update)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
canvasRenderer: (canvas: HTMLCanvasElement) => (fn: Fn<import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, Vec>, x?: number, y?: number, w?: number, h?: number) => void
```
